casebody.data:
Faith JONES
v.
Thomas DALTON, M.D., Wilmington Anesthesiologists, L.L.P., Gloria Moley, C.R.N.A., and New Hanover Regional Medical Center. No. 423P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Marie Moseley, W. Gregory Merritt, New Bern, for Gloria Moley, et al. Carl W. Thurman, III, Andrew R. Kirschner, Atlanta, GA, Jennifer J. Slusser, Wilmington, for Faith Jones.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant (Gloria Moley, C.R.N.A.) on the 11th day of August 2005 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of October 2500."
